short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searching and organizing your Twitter Likes and Bookmarks is a pain. Favourites.io makes it so much easier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Favourites.io Twitter Bookmarks extension enables you to search, tag and export your Twitter Likes & Bookmarks.

Used with favourites.io, you can search your likes and bookmarks by keyword, username, tweet date, media type and tag.  You can also organize your Bookmarks (and likes) into categories for easy retrieval.

The extension enables you search, filter and exports your Bookmarks (and likes).

Once the extension is installed, you will have the option of signing up for a favourites.io account.
